article_title: How the Bangkok Bomb Attack Is Affecting Tourism
article_text:
Smoke Alarms on EgyptAir Flight Hint at Cause of Crash

01:40 - Mark Martin, founder and chief executive officer at Martin Consulting, discusses what may have happened to EgyptAir flight 804. He speaks to Manus Cranny on "Bloomberg Markets Middle East." (Source: Bloomberg)

article_metadata.description: QUO CEO David Keen discusses how the bomb attack in Bangkok is affecting tourism in Thailand. He speaks with Bloomberg's Rishaad Salamat on "Trending Business." (Source: Bloomberg)
